#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
    ll t,x,ans;
    double a=log10(M_E);
    scanf ("%lld",&t);
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf ("%lld",&x);
        if (x==0)
            ans=1;
        else
            ans=ceil(x*a);
        printf ("%lld\n",ans);
    }
}
